import './post.css' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" export default function Post({post}){ const PF = "http://localhost:3000/images/" const test =PF+post.photo; console.log(test); return(
{post.photo && ( )}
{post.categories.map(c=>( {c.name} ))}
{post.title}
{new Date(post.createdAt).toDateString()}

{post.desc}

) }
